description:
Here is a summary of topics covered in this course.

  • Learn Statistics in plain and simple terms from basics to the advanced concepts.
  • Learn to perform statistical analysis using Minitab 17 software for your Six Sigma Black Belt projects
  • A wide range of topics covered starting from the basics to advance topics such as Measurement System Analysis (MSA), Gage R&R, Hypothesis Testing, ANOVA and Design of Experiments.

Key Features:

  • No need to pay $500 - $2,000.
  • No need to take days off from your work.
  • Certificate of Completion provided.
  • Satisfaction Guaranteed. Get your money back in 30 days if you are not satisfied.

This course is prepared based on my 30 years of practical experience in Quality Management.

You will learn the statistical analysis for your Six Sigma Black Belt projects using Minitab 17 through short and easy to understand video lessons and quizzes. Discussion forum on the right side of this course would be used to discussed specific problems and issues.
title: Six Sigma Black Belt Statistics Using Minitab
